data.name: TRIOS - lofi beats / numbers to chill to
data.detailed_description:
TRIOS is a game about numbers and the fun you can have with them. Deceptively simple, surprisingly challenging.

Select two numbers and one operator, then watch them combine to create a new number. Use all your numbers to reach the target.

Features

  • Journey mode: A series of puzzles with escalating difficulty
  • Infinite mode: Randomly generated puzzles that adapt difficulty to your pace
  • A selection of chill tunes and beautiful backgrounds to guide you into flow
data.about_the_game:
TRIOS is a game about numbers and the fun you can have with them. Deceptively simple, surprisingly challenging.

Select two numbers and one operator, then watch them combine to create a new number. Use all your numbers to reach the target.

Features

  • Journey mode: A series of puzzles with escalating difficulty
  • Infinite mode: Randomly generated puzzles that adapt difficulty to your pace
  • A selection of chill tunes and beautiful backgrounds to guide you into flow
data.short_description: TRIOS is a relaxing, minimalist maths puzzle game. Take your time, chill out with some numbers. Deceptively simple, surprisingly challenging.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any from the last 4 years
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
